mapper.insert: insert into b_board (bno, title, content, writer, regdate) values(board_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, sysdate)
mapper.update: update b_board set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, writer=#{writer} where bno=#{bno}
mapper.select: select bno, title, writer, regdate from b_board order by bno desc
